0.1.0.name: opentracing

scripts.webpack: npm run webpack-node-debug && npm run webpack-node-prod && npm run webpack-browser-debug && npm run webpack-browser-prod

0.12.1.name: opentracing

scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=debug istanbul cover --report lcovonly --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.cover-html: NODE_ENV=debug istanbul cover --report html --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack-browser-debug && npm run webpack-browser-prod

0.12.1.description: This library is a JavaScript implementation of Open Tracing API. It is intended for use both on the server and in the browser.

0.13.0.name: opentracing

scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=debug istanbul cover --report lcovonly --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.cover-html: NODE_ENV=debug istanbul cover --report html --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack-browser-debug && npm run webpack-browser-prod

0.13.0.description: This library is a JavaScript implementation of Open Tracing API. It is intended for use both on the server and in the browser.

scripts.test-cover: istanbul cover --report lcovonly --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha lib/test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.cover-html: istanbul cover --report html --print none ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha lib/test/unittest.js -- --check-leaks --color && istanbul report text
scripts.webpack: webpack --display-error-details
